titlepage.titleproper: Guide to Research Notes Concerning Augustus Moore Herringcirca 1964
titlepage.author: Finding aid prepared by SCRC

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Research Notes Concerning Augustus Moore Herring

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Contains correspondence, manuscript notes, bibliography, printed essays, photostats, and typed notes on early aviation. Partly collected by J. Sherwin Murphy. Includes transcribed typewritten copies of correspondence between Herring and Octave Chanute, selected by Pearl I. Young.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Herring, August Moore. Research Notes Concerning Augustus Moore Herring, Crerar Ms 171, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Contains correspondence, manuscript notes, bibliography, printed essays, photostats, and typed notes on early aviation. Partly collected by J. Sherwin Murphy. Includes transcribed typewritten copies of correspondence between Herring and Octave Chanute, selected by Pearl I. Young.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Resources
relatedmaterial.p: The following related resources are located in the Department of Special Collections:
